tool_description: Endpoint for getting the price and meta data of a product on Farfetch
name: Farfetch Pricing Data
title: Farfetch Pricing Data

api_list.name: Farfetch
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting the price and meta data of a product on Farfetch
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://farfetch-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/farfetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farfetch-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://farfetch-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/farfetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farfetch-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
